allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
REFACTOR/FEAT: Major refactoring across all jobs + enhance BST/BRD systems

This comprehensive update refactors all 16 job modules with significant enhancements:

- All Jobs: Updated PRECAST/MIDCAST/AFTERCAST/STATUS/BUFFS/COMMANDS patterns for consistency
- BST: Enhanced pet management, ready move categorization, and specialized messages system
- BRD: Improved song rotation manager, set builder logic, and song configuration
- RDM: Major command system refactor and cleanup (removed obsolete MOVEMENT module)
- Core Systems: Streamlined message handlers, improved midcast/precast managers
- Configuration: Updated keybinds, states, and UI settings across all jobs
- Equipment Sets: Refined gear sets for BLM, BRD, BST, COR, DNC, DRK, GEO, PLD, RDM, RUN, WAR
- Cleanup: Removed obsolete watchdog integration, test registry, and outdated documentation
- Database: Enhanced BST JA database and universal WS database entries
- Config: Updated message settings for debuffs, enfeebling, enhancing, JA, and WS

This refactoring maintains the modular architecture while improving code quality and consistency across all jobs.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit --amend -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
REFACTOR/FEAT: Major refactoring across all jobs + enhance BST/BRD systems

This comprehensive update refactors all 16 job modules with significant enhancements:

- All Jobs: Updated PRECAST/MIDCAST/AFTERCAST/STATUS/BUFFS/COMMANDS patterns for consistency
- BST: Enhanced pet management, ready move categorization, and specialized messages system
- BRD: Improved song rotation manager, set builder logic, and song configuration
- RDM: Major command system refactor and cleanup (removed obsolete MOVEMENT module)
- Core Systems: Streamlined message handlers, improved midcast/precast managers
- Configuration: Updated keybinds, states, and UI settings across all jobs
- Equipment Sets: Refined gear sets for BLM, BRD, BST, COR, DNC, DRK, GEO, PLD, RDM, RUN, WAR
- Cleanup: Removed obsolete watchdog integration, test registry, and outdated documentation
- Database: Enhanced BST JA database and universal WS database entries
- Config: Updated message settings for debuffs, enfeebling, enhancing, JA, and WS

This refactoring maintains the modular architecture while improving code quality and consistency across all jobs.
EOF
)")
Bash(for job in blm brd bst cor dnc drk geo pld pup rdm run sam thf war whm)
